# Select Input

```{r select-input}
selectInput(
    inputId='StateSelection',
    label='Please choose a state',
    choices=list('NY', 'NJ', 'MA', 'RI', 'TX'),
    selected='MA'
)
```

```{r print-state}
renderText(input$StateSelection)
```
